oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Managing Invasive Alien Species by the European Union: Lessons Learnt
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kr√§mer, Ludwig
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: theme:invasion management
introduced species
invasive species
invasion management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title> <jats:p>The contribution concentrates on the fight against invasive alien species within the European Union (EU), which groups 27 States. In 2014, the EU adopted a regulation to identify and manage invasive alien species. This regulation and its monitoring are discussed in detail, in order to see, what lessons can be learnt from the cooperation and concertation of the different states.</jats:p>
